answers.answer: I had my daughter at exactly 37 weeks. My water broke at 36 and 5 days so they induced me due to risk of infection. It took 44 hours for her to come. She was 5 pounds 12 ounces. Did everything a full term baby would do. We went home the next day. She did have a little bit of jaundice so we had to take her every few days to monitor her levels but she was just fine :-)

I was induced at 37 weeks with my son because I had cholrstasis. He is completely healthy. He was born 6.74 pounds and 20 inches long. A healthy baby. No concerns. The doctors kept us 2 nights due to the circumstances but all turned out well. He started bottle feeding when he was around 3 weeks old but I breast fed him exclusively til then. He had not problems though. Took to the bottle instantly

My little boy was born at 36 weeks due to ruptured placenta. He was 7.5 at birth. Latched wonderfully. Went home after 3 days. He has had a rough first year. Rsv. Ezema. Breathing problems. Milk protein allergies.  He will be 1 year old on Friday and is finally a healthy little boy. No medications. And is now on whole milk.

My son was born at 37+2 and weighed 8 lbs and 10 oz and was 21.5 inches long. He was completely healthy and I did not have gestational diabetes. I breast fed him and his sucking reflex was always in super drive.
I had my daughter at 35 weeks and she was 5lbs 5oz and completely healthy she has problems pooping but that's cause she's lactose intolerant.
Pretty much same story as the first gal ♡

My first daughter was born at 37+1. She weighed 7 lbs 14 oz 20 and a half inches  and was perfectly healthy. She had jaundice and I'm type one diabetic so we stayed a week just to monitor her and me better. She is now 14th months old and still healthy ands can be and I'm due to have my second daughter November 28th (:
I had my daughter at 36+5 and she weighed 6 lbs 14 oz and 21 1/2 inches long. She was perfectly healthy and took the bottle right away.

question: Have any one of you gave birth at 35 36 or 37 weeks? if so what week,  what was there health status how mch did they weigh, could they bottle feed? How long did they spend in hospital and was it a boy or girl ..
title: early birth
